meaningMnemonic: The <radical>mouth</radical> <radical>clan</radical> are a group of <kanji>people</kanji>. They are the <kanji>people</kanji> of a <kanji>nation</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The mouth clan <kanji>peoples</kanji> are a <kanji>nation</kanji> of <kanji>people</kanji> who use their mouths to say <reading>mean</reading> (みん) things to other peoples.
